heading: 15.1.1 Psychophysics Toolbox
text:
PsychoPhysics Toolbox (PTB; https://psychtoolbox.org) free set functions MATLAB open source language syntax nearly identical MATLAB called Octave (https://www.gnu.org/software/octave/).
PTB originally developed vision scientists conduct studies using psychophysical techniques using computer monitors.
Accordingly, PTB functions provide precise control computer monitors, audio devices, input devices like keyboards, mice, button boxes.
project now open source.
repository hosted GitHub https://github.com/Psychtoolbox-3/Psychtoolbox-3.Peter Scarfe created set tutorials new PTB users. tutorials may found https://peterscarfe.com/ptbtutorials.html.example, absolutely minimal example script (https://peterscarfe.com/insertedCode/TotallyMinimalDemo.html) gives flavor PTB code looks feels like.
